original_title: Les Autres - Les immigrants peuvent-ils sauver Huntingdon?
overview: Huntingdon Mayor Stéphane Gendron wants to encourage immigration to save his town, which has been struggling ever since large-scale factory closures some years ago.  Mayor Gendron’s project is a way in to a discussion about immigration and social and economic integration.
title: Les Autres - Les immigrants peuvent-ils sauver Huntingdon?
